discourse_list.title: Right Time for UNI Screenshot Airdrop to HODLers private wallet

content.content: Is it not the right time for the Uniswap Team / Owners to Consider a monthly or quarterly Screenshot of private wallet address holders of UNI who don’t sell but "HODL for benefits or airdrop… What do you think?
content.GPT-summary: The author is proposing a monthly or quarterly screenshot of private wallet address holders of UNI who don't sell but "HODL for benefits or airdrop." The author is asking for feedback on this proposal, and a 3rd party could provide constructive criticism on the feasibility and potential drawbacks of this proposal.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is asking for feedback

content.content: you can basically make a snapshot of blockchain at any block you want

I started holding and using uniswap the day it was listed on coinbase. I still hold the uni that I originally purchased back in late September. I was definitely bummed out to have missed the airdrop by mere days, so with that being said, I’d definitely appreciate if they could find a way to show some love to people like me. I’m a big fan of uniswap, and am excited to see how much more it’ll grow and prosper. I am in it for the long haul. Thanks for reading.
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party giving constructive criticism of proposal

content.content: Something like Earn rewards by holding UNI tokens, 1INCH tokens did it successfully and it is still on at the moment. or If you are a UNI holder, you can stake your tokens on the UNI protocol and collect governance rewards. where Staking by itself could be sufficient to be rewarded. and also opens up more opportunity in the UNI protocol community/Family.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is asking for feedback

content.content: I never used of any tokens yet since i made it possible to… Im not gteedy… I think u should hold yr assets dont be scared… For there is the almighty nd he is watching over us… I alwayz wonder as a boy wot was my meaning on earth… Then covide strikes, it was tough for every one…​But i never felt like this… I felt sad, i felt down…​I waned to give back… Nd today i feel better, so no selfishness kanhala…​Its my destiny (genisis) blockchain was difficult at first working my 6 to 5 job nd focus on helping my beloved community… I love my nabour

Maybe it is better to ask what are these contributor grants, and community initiatives in the first place.

content.content: i think i will be more fair to do an airdrop for newcomers

I love uniswap  however it’s an expensive platform to do transactions. I’ve spent more money on gas than tokens. I’m looking forward to Uni V 3 coming on board. I’ve got a ton of coins stuck on my MetaMask because it’s too expensive to sell or buy. My opinion about airdrops should be shared among users as well as Holder, people buying and selling  help create the value of the coin.

content.content: the rewards should not be awarded to holders but to those who actively participate in the governance of the uni and who are involved in it apart from that the holders not involve should not receive a new airdropi; it’s pretty easy to keep a token to make a profit- the engagement is more complicated
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party giving constructive criticism of proposal

content.content: Reminder that there will never be another UNI airdrop.
you should give the greeting to the uni team man, not by doubting them…be grateful in this life man, everything will be okay…
we should never say never.

sure. but actively expecting something which is almost garanteed to never happen can be tricky. and as I said, the more people talk about an highly unlikely upcoming uni airdrop, the more scammers have incentive to prey on gullible/uninformed users. it’s your choice, really.  check out the discord AMA channel to see the team give a definitive answer (NO) on future airdrops if you don’t believe me sir. always do you own research.
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party giving constructive criticism of proposal

content.content: How the distribution will be made was explained very clearly and clearly. You don’t need to do extra research on this topic.     Year Community Treasury Distribution %     Year 1 172,000,000 UNI 40%    |Year 2|129,000,000 UNI|30%|   Ethereum (ETH) Blockchain Explorer    TreasuryVester | 0xe3953d9d317b834592ab58ab2c7a6ad22b54075d The Contract Address 0xe3953d9d317b834592ab58ab2c7a6ad22b54075d page allows users to view the source code, transactions, balances, and analytics for the contract address. Users can also interact and make transactions to the contract directly on...      |Year 3|86,000,000 UNI|20%| |Year 4|43,000,000 UNI|10%| This airdrop will happen even if you don’t want it to be. the team says that they will not make a different airdrop. and they will be distributed gradually for 4 years. An airdrop clarified in the uni https://uniswap.org/blog/uni/ and yes this is not subject to community voting… However, if you want to wonder, what you should be wondering is how this will be distributed. But if you don’t want this airdrobu and it falls into your wallet, feel free to send it to this address. (Don’t worry, I’ll send your gas charge back to you.) 0x0400AF79fE1e6A6B8861b4576cEfe8D6e7D5D5dF I wanted to share an address when I thought it was not difficult to send something that you thought would never happen. And if you send them to this address, you can still think as if it didn’t happen. Don’t worry, if you admit you’re wrong and share an address, I’ll be happy to send you the airdrop from my wallet. uni will be shared for the community and of course with the community.
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party giving constructive criticism of proposal
